title: Cool Culture - Give to Get Party
desc: It?s going up on a Tuesday! Please join Cool Culture and Stella Artois for the ultimate 2015 #GivingTuesday "Give to Get" Party and Fundraising event.  On December 1st we will be at MIST Harlem from 7-10 to party for a cause and raise funds for Cool Culture?s programs. Admission to this event includes:  ? Documented by? http://DINNER-LAND.com ?@dinner_land ? 100% of ticket sales go to Cool Culture, Inc. So GIVE a small donation come out and have a good time, but remember?.you must GIVE to GET! ? ? For more information please contact:? Meki Adefris at madefris@coolculture.org or ?Adjoa Nyarko at anyarko@coolculture.org? ? What is #GivingTuesday?  We have a day for giving thanks. We have two for getting deals. Now, we have #GivingTuesday, a global day dedicated to giving back. On Tuesday, December 1, 2015, charities, families, businesses, community centers, and students around the world will come together for one common purpose: to celebrate generosity and to give. ? ? OUR MISSION Cool Culture ensures that New York?s most diverse families with preschool-aged children have access to arts and culture as a way to increase literacy and learning in early childhood and to prepare children to succeed in school.
